title: Layout
content:
#

The Layout class is the basis for creating grids. It has functionality for
converting between pixel and grid space and supports different orientations.


Interface#




Orientation#

Layout supports two orientations, namely the "pointy" and the "flat"
orientation.




Pixel to hex#

The pixel to hex conversion is useful for interactions. For instance it can be
used to find the hex that the user is currently hovering.




Hex to pixel#

The hex to pixel conversion is useful for drawing.
